**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Surjit Hamelan](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1500) **Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 39 **Perception** +25; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +26, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +25 **Str** +3 **Dex** +5 **Con** +5 **Int** +0 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +0 **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ with 20 arrows, _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [hook sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=163)_ --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +24 **Ref** +26 **Will** +23 **HP** 220 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** Surjit can use a ranged weapon to make an Attack of Opportunity as though the weapon had a [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) of 10 feet.
**Sense the Unseen** **Trigger** Surjit fails a Perception check to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84); **Effect** Surjit automatically senses any [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) creatures in the area where he was Seeking, making them merely [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to him. --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet, swim 20 feet **Melee** _hook sword_ +26 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), [Twin](/Traits.aspx?ID=197)), **Damage** 2d6+11 slashing **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +28 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 3d6+11 piercing **Camouflage** While in natural terrain, Surjit can [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) even while [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27). **Clear the Rain** ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Surjit Strides twice. Difficult terrain doesn't slow his movement. Any space Surjit enters becomes normal terrain rather than difficult terrain (or difficult terrain rather than greater difficult terrain) until the start of his next turn. **Rain-Scribe Arrow** When Surjit critically hits a creature with a ranged weapon or hits a creature for the second time on a turn with a ranged weapon, Surjit can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one magic effect on the creature (counteract level 7th). He uses his attack modifier as his counteract modifier. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** Surjit deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) targets.
